description:
I'm Mohamed Khaled Elsharaby, a computer science graduate with strong CCNA-level knowledge.
Through internships at ITI, CodeAlpha, and The Sparks Foundation, I gained hands-on experience in web, mobile, and IT support.
My graduation project—a price comparison web app—was awarded the top grade of 1.0.
I'm especially passionate about networking and system integration and seeking an apprenticeship in that field.
I speak German at B2 level, am ready to relocate, and all my documents are complete and officially certified.
